sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The booke of common prayer, and adminystracion of the sacramentes, and other rites and ceremonies in the Churche of Englande. Book of common prayer Church of England.
[439] p.
in officina Edovardi Whitchurche., Londini, : [1553?].
Colophon: Jmprinted at London in Fletestrete at the signe of the Sunne, ouer agaynste the Conduyte, by Edward Whytchurche. Date of publication from STC (2nd ed.). "Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum." Signatures: a⁸ [par.]⁸ A-P⁸ ²A-I⁸ K⁴ Aa⁸. Title in ornamental border (McK. & Ferg. 38), Psalter border (McK. & Ferg. 60β), initials, one col. black letter. In pt. 1, 'C' of sign. C₁ is under 'e' of 'worde'. Special t.p.: The psalter or Psalmes of Dauid, after the trãslacion of the greate Byble, poynted as it shalbe sayed or song in Churches. Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======
The booke of common prayer, and adminystracion of the sacramentes, and other rites and ceremonies in the Churche of Englande. Book of common prayer Church of England.
[439] p.
in officina Edovardi Whitchurche., Londini, : [1553?].
Colophon: Jmprinted at London in Fletestrete at the signe of the Sunne, ouer agaynste the Conduyte, by Edward Whytchurche. Date of publication from STC (2nd ed.). "Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum." Signatures: a⁸ [par.]⁸ A-P⁸ ²A-I⁸ K⁴ Aa⁸. Title in ornamental border (McK. & Ferg. 38), Psalter border (McK. & Ferg. 60β), initials, one col. black letter. In pt. 1, 'C' of sign. C₁ is under 'e' of 'worde'. Special t.p.: The psalter or Psalmes of Dauid, after the trãslacion of the greate Byble, poynted as it shalbe sayed or song in Churches. Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
officina Edovardi Whitchurche.
